title: Trading Platform: Deposit (request)
description: Deposit funds from wallet account to trading platform account

amount.description: Amount to deposit (in the currency of from_wallet).

from_account.description: Wallet account to transfer money from.

to_account.description: Trading account login to deposit money to.

loginid.description: [Optional] The login id of the user. Mandatory when multiple tokens were provided during authorize.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
